name: Firm Grip
description:
This game was made for my Integrated Project 2, which is the major group project for year 2 in university where I worked as a designer and team leader with 3 artists and a programmer.

The game was focused on the brief for a local multiplayer game (2 in our case) that is a sports game that could not happen in real life and has the theme of Sci-fi/Fantasy. The idea was for the game to be wacky and creative! 

It is controlled by a controller for both players: the left stick controls the directions of the limbs of the player and the x, y, a, and b buttons on the controller correspond to a specific limb - the idea is to use your limbs as grapples to propel you to the flags that spawn around and whoever gets the most flags wins! it is based on the rock climbing sport but in a low gravity space with the idea, you can interact with the enemy player to halt them back.
